info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and northeastern Nassau Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Melville, or near Farmingdale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Commack, Huntington Station, Centereach, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Medford, Massapequa, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Syosset, Babylon and Patchogue. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
